alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 1:10PM MDT until October 27 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...A mix of freezing rain and snow will transition to snow tonight. Ice accumulations around a light glaze. Snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches with locally heavier accumulations possible. * WHERE...Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT Thursday Night. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will become slick, snow covered, and hazardous. Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
